message: Can someone recommend a good router brand for me? Something that doesn't restart every 2-4 hours?

data.message:
http://www.egprices.com/en/product/tp-link-td-w8970-wireless-n300-gigabit-adsl2-modem-router-east-asia
أنصحك بالراوتر دا هو غالي شوية (500 جنيه) بس يستاهل, و هو عندي و بيقعد بالأيام مش بقرب منه 
و بيتعمله ريستارت لما النور يقطع بس

زمان جبت واحد اسمه 3com OfficeConnect كان نصيحة من واحد صاحبي والحقيقه شغال على مدار الساعه بقاله يمكن أكتر من 6 سنين ماحاصالوش حاجه غير مرّة واحده بس الشاحن بتاعه باظ نتيجة سوء الكهربا، وتجربة صاحبي له كانت سنين برضو معاه زي الفل، وتغطية الوايرلس له كانت أحسن الموجود وقتها عن تجربه، ربما دلوقتي فيه حاجات أحدث مش عارف
3Com is the best, will be abit expensive but worth it.

Thank you for your suggestions.
Please consider that I will have to leave it opened for 24/7 because I am either backing up files or downloading files, so, if you suspect that your suggestion can not withstand such abuse, please let me know.
Thanks a lot again. :)
3Com is the best ... especially OfficeConnect like mentioned above. I leave it working for years, not hours :D ... it never restarts with low power and poor connection
I once had the same IP address assigned to my ADSL for 27 days
Just to be clear: when the phone line is directly feeding your router, not through a splitter, yet your connection resets every 5 seconds, that's when you need a new router, right?
You need a splitter to separate the 2 frequencies. Without a splitter, you can still connect the router and have a stable connection, until an incoming call which interrupts the ADSL connection.
Tp link...I can't recall myself restarting it (except for applying changes)
Mine is tp link and it's restarting every 5 minutes
